context: The word 'kirjoitti' is the third-person singular past indicative form of the verb 'kirjoittaa', which means 'to write'. It translates to 'wrote' in English. The example sentences demonstrate its usage in different contexts, showing who performed the action of writing ('H채n kirjoitti...' - He/She wrote...), what was written ('runon' - a poem), and when it happened ('eilen' - yesterday).
